text:
Robby Technologies | https://robby.io | Cambridge, MA | Software/computer vision engineers

Robby is an autonomous robot which delivers things to your doorstep. Self-driving cars are almost here. While theyâ€™re going to shuttle you around town, we believe the next big thing is to shuttle stuff around autonomously as well, from packages to food to everything else you need.

We are an angel-funded team with 2 MIT EECS PhD founders and looking for software engineers (C++/Python) with skills in the following areas:

* Visual SLAM, LIDAR-based SLAM

* Object recognition/detection

* Deep learning

* Robot system integration

Contact: jobs@robby.io
